attributes.action: We request that the Tory Government remove Theresa May as Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: Theresa May has not been elected by the people of the UK. It is the democratic and sovereign right of the people of the UK to decide who leads our county. We must have our say who leads our country forward at such a important political time regarding negotiations with the EU. We have no confidence that Theresa May will do this and demand a General Election or vote on who we feel best to lead the UK within in the Conservative Party.
attributes.background:
On the 14th July 2016 Theresa May was made Prime Minister of the UK.  
We have no confidence in Theresa May and feel she is not the best person to lead our country forward with EU negotiations. 
Theresa May has not been elected by the people of the UK which is our democratic and sovereign right.
